thread.title: BRIEF-HopFed Bancorp Says Entered Standstill Agreement With Stilwell Group And Mark Alcott

title: BRIEF-HopFed Bancorp Says Entered Standstill Agreement With Stilwell Group And Mark Alcott

organizations.name: brief-hopfed bancorp says entered standstill agreement with stilwell group
stilwell group and mark alcott reuters staff

text:
April 11 (Reuters) - HopFed Bancorp Inc:
* HOPFED BANCORP INC SAYS ON APRIL 10, 2018, CO ENTERED INTO A STANDSTILL AGREEMENT WITH STILWELL GROUP AND MARK D. ALCOTT - SEC FILING
* HOPFED BANCORP - AGREEMENT PROVIDES THAT, EFFECTIVE UPON A MEETING OF BOARD OF DIRECTORS, BOARD WILL BE EXPANDED BY ONE BOARD SEAT
* HOPFED BANCORP SAYS STILWELL GROUP OWNS ABOUT 9.5 PCT OF SHARES OF CO'S OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK Source text: ( bit.ly/2GQJYCO ) Further company coverage:
